com.interpss.core.aclf.adj

Interface IAclfAdjustment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AclfControlBus, BaseHvdcLine2TVSC<TBus>, BranchFlowControl, FunctionLoad, HvdcLine2T, HvdcLine2TCCC, HvdcLine2TVSC, HvdcLine2TVSCDyn, HvdcLine2TVSCDynPlus, PQBusLimit, PSXfrPControl, PVBusLimit, RemoteQBus, StaticVarCompensator, SwitchedShunt, TapControl
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AclfControlBusImpl, BaseHvdcLine2TVSCImpl, BranchFlowControlImpl, FunctionLoadImpl, HvdcLine2TCCCImpl, HvdcLine2TImpl, HvdcLine2TVSCDynImpl, HvdcLine2TVSCImpl, PQBusLimitImpl, PSXfrPControlImpl, PVBusLimitImpl, RemoteQBusImpl, StaticVarCompensatorImpl, SwitchedShuntImpl, TapControlImpl

    public interface IAclfAdjustment
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'IBus Adjustment'. Interface for implementing Aclf Adjustment, such as PVLimit control
    See Also:
    AclfAdjustPackage.getIAclfAdjustment()

    • Method Detail

      • needAdjust

        boolean needAdjust(double tolerance)
        Check if there is a need to perform adjustment. The info is used when checking LF convergence. The actual adjustment might be delayed depending on adjustment implementation.
        Parameters:
        tolerance - Error tolerance for deciding adj/control action. In general, if certain value of the adj/control device is less than the tolerance, there is no need for further adj/control action.

      • performAdjust

        boolean performAdjust(double accFactor)
        Perform adjustment. Rules may be implement to determine when the adjustment might be performed.
        Parameters:
        accFactor - acceleration factor for the adjustment, default value 1.0.
